jobDescription: Job Title Senior Data Analyst, Human Resources  21-Jun-2018 Your RoleFossil Group is looking for a Senior Analyst to join our HR Systems and Reporting team within the HRIS department. The Senior Reporting Analyst is charged with developing and deploying best practice Talent Management reporting supporting the global organization. The Analyst uses data from various applications to document the current state of HR transactions and processes in order to provide a factual basis for recommending improvements. This position serves a variety of internal and external clients, including the Global HR, Finance, and Strategy teams. As a leader within the department, this person will also have ownership of the Applicant Tracking/Onboard System (IBM Kenexa BrassRing) and will oversee all other required and miscellaneous reporting for the Global organization. Other responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Collaborates closely with HRIS, Payroll, and other HR team members to gather business requirements, document, design and configure RPA system for process automation.Owns design, configuration, and maintenance of the Applicant Tracking System to ensure it meets the needs of the Recruiting Team and also remains compliant with Affirmative Action Plan. (Configuration training provided)Provides all analysis required by Affirmative Action Plan. Partners with counsel and HR Operations to establish placement goals.Completes all required annual reports, such as AAP snapshot data, Impact Ratio Analysis reports, EEO-1, Vets-100, etc.Completes miscellaneous reporting or data gathering for projects assigned to the department within system integrations, acquisitions, process creations, etc.Executes ad hoc report requests from HR team and various partners throughout the organization.Partners with other divisions within the organization on various assignments requiring HR documentation and/or data manipulation.Manages HR Reporting Coordinator and oversees other various HR Reporting areas of responsibility.Get To Know Us Fossil Group, Inc. is a global design, marketing and distribution company specializing in consumer lifestyle and fashion accessories. In a word, we’re innovators (and proud of it). In 1984, we were a small watch business with five employees. Today, under a diverse portfolio of proprietary and licensed brands, we offer watches, jewelry, handbags, small leather goods and, most recently, wearables. With our newest owned brand, Misfit, we are uniquely positioned to lead the convergence of style and technology in the high-growth connected space. Our strategic channels of distribution include department stores, specialty stores, eCommerce websites and more than 600 company-owned and operated retail stores. Find even more information, including press releases and SEC filings, at www.fossilgroup.com.
